snippet.title: Omega Mouse Zero - Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Play now for free on Itch.
https://omegamouse.itch.io/omegamousezero

Omega Mouse Zero is a 2.5D platformer with Metroid-Vania & RPG elements.  Embark on an epic adventure across the OmegaVerse on a mission to save all versions of Omega Mouse.  Only with their unique powers combined can they defeat their greatest enemy, the Cats In Black.

#screenshotsaturday #metroidvania #rpg #videogames #pcgaming #platformer #cat #mouse #unrealengine #indiegame #trailer #gameplay #demo #itchio
